example.text: Rather than working with Democrats to enact comprehensive immigration reform, Republicans are pushing a partisan package that will separate families at the border. Immigrants make our country stronger, & we need a humane immigration system that reflects that. [[url]]

The American people are tired of divisive and extreme policies coming out of Washington. They want real, bipartisan solutions. The America’s CHILDREN Act is one bicameral, bipartisan solution we must pursue. [[url]]

Last Congress, my bill to address the shortage of Sexual Assault Nurse Examiners was signed into law. I promise to always support our nurses & fight to ensure they have the resources they need. Thanks again for all the work that you do!

Republicans have betrayed the people of North Carolina & turned back the clock 50 years. But this fight isn’t over. Republicans will feel the ramifications of this abortion ban at the ballot box. [[url]]

Last Congress, my bill to address the shortage of Sexual Assault Nurse Examiners was signed into law. I promise to always support our nurses & fight to ensure they have the resources they need. Thanks again for all the work that you do!

Today on Tamil Genocide Remembrance Day, I'm proud to re-introduce a resolution recognizing 14 years since the end of the conflict in Sri Lanka and promoting justice & accountability. Those who violate human rights must be held accountable, & I support Tamil demands for justice.

Last Congress, my bill to address the shortage of Sexual Assault Nurse Examiners was signed into law. I promise to always support our nurses & fight to ensure they have the resources they need. Thanks again for all the work that you do!
